name: Organic Honeycrisp Apple
description: Organic, delicious Honeycrisp Apple, grown and harvested at a local farm.

name: Artichoke
description: Our green Artichokes are produced year round, the highest quality with the freshest taste.

name: Aubergine
description: Mild, earthy-flavored Aubergine that has the most velvety texture inside.

name: Avacado
description: Delicious Hass Avocados have a buttery texture and rich flavor. Ripe and ready to eat!

name: Bacon
description: Meat to fat ratio is equal, hand-trimmed bacon.

name: Broccoli
description: Nutritious and low in calories! Fresh green Broccoli that has a satisfying crunch.

name: Candy
description: Classic candies in a variety of flavors like lemon, orange, pineapple, raspberry and strawberry.

name: Chili Peppers
description: Bright red, spicy Chili Peppers. Add heat to all of your favorite dishes.

name: Crab
description: Always fresh, never frozen. Flaky and delicate crab for steaming or stewing.

name: Chocolate Cupcake
description: Delicious chocolate cake with buttercream icing. Freshly made by a local bakery.
